data.quote: For one who feels compelled, as I do, to accept the existence of the Master Architect, it is important to examine his handiwork for the light it throws on him and on his program for his children. data.quote: In Western lands there is a distinct division between the religious and the secular life. There is one rule of conduct for laymen and another for clergymen. data.quote: To the first class belong the Gospels and Acts; to the second, the Epistles; to the third, the Revelation.

data.quote: I was a very religious child - I went to synagogue at least once, sometimes twice, a day. data.quote: Religion is organized to satisfy and guide the soul - politics does the same thing for the body.

data.quote: Religion is induced insanity.

data.quote: Time is money.

data.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. data.quote: It's been proven by quite a few studies that plants are good for our psychological development. If you green an area, the rate of crime goes down. data.quote: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.

data.quote: We live in deeds, not years; in thoughts, not breaths; in feelings, not in figures on a dial. We should count time by heart throbs. He most lives who thinks most, feels the noblest, acts the best.

data.quote: There's a time in your life where you're not quite sure where you are. You think everything's perfect, but it's not perfect... Then one day you wake up and you can't quite picture yourself in the situation you're in. But the secret is, if you can picture yourself doing anything in life, you can do it.

data.category: Life, Day, You Can Do It

data.quote: Love is a strange emotion. It is ever evolving. Lust is transient. With time, one realizes that love and togetherness are two different things. Very few people are lucky enough to experience the two emotions simultaneously.

data.quote: I think it's important for us as a society to remember that the youth within juvenile justice systems are, most of the time, youths who simply haven't had the right mentors and supporters around them - because of circumstances beyond their control.

data.quote: It takes discipline not to let social media steal your time.

data.quote: Encouragement to others is something everyone can give. Somebody needs what you have to give. It may not be your money it may be your time. It may be your listening ear. It may be your arms to encourage. It may be your smile to uplift. Who knows?

All these things are qualities of survivors.

data.quote: In this hectic life, we have no time to take care of ourselves, hence massage is needed for rejuvenation and stress reduction. data.quote: Projects are usually undertaken to either solve a problem or take advantage of an opportunity. data.quote: It has been said that time heals all wounds. I don't agree. The wounds remain. Time - the mind, protecting its sanity - covers them with some scar tissue and the pain lessens, but it is never gone.

data.quote: I was six months old at the time that I was taken, with my mother and father, from Sacramento, California, and placed in internment camps in the United States.

data.quote: If you spend any time with a man, you'll realize that we're all still little boys.
data.author: Paul Walker

data.quote: Nothing to me is unexpected. No disappointment is unexpected - whether it's movies or people or relationships. I'm always ready for the punch directly between the eyes. So I get hurt, but I never get hurt. Happens all the time.
data.author: Brian Grazer

data.quote: I like to think of myself as the host at a party, and, if everybody is having a good time, so much the better.
data.author: John Curran

data.quote: A lot of things have been thrown at me in life, and I've got through it all without a rule book, taking it one day at a time.
data.author: Yoko Ono

data.quote: I've been called a recluse. There's definitely truth in that. I like to spend time alone.
data.author: Kendrick Lamar

data.quote: Time is an illusion. Time only exists when we think about the past and the future. Time doesn't exist in the present here and now.
data.author: Marina Abramovic

data.quote: There's no good way to waste your time. Wasting time is just wasting time.
data.author: Helen Mirren

data.quote: I still get the jitters every time I start a new job! I love it - makes you feel alive.
data.author: Camille Guaty

data.quote: I used to tease Joe Louis by reminding him that I was the greatest of all time. But Joe Louis was the greatest heavyweight fighter ever.
data.author: Muhammad Ali

data.quote: Can't even see without my vintage Versace frames. I don't go nowhere without them on. I can't even live without them. Every time I throw them on, I see all the haters, and I see where the money at.
data.author: Quavo

data.quote: 'Good English' is whatever educated people talk so that what is good in one place or time would not be so in another.
data.author: C. S. Lewis

data.quote: Everything we say signifies; everything counts, that we put out into the world. It impacts on kids, it impacts on the zeitgeist of the time.
data.author: Meryl Streep

data.quote: People of Berlin - people of the world - this is our moment. This is our time.
data.author: Barack Obama

data.quote: I practiced drawing all the time and became very interested in it. If I was at a meeting that wasn't getting anywhere - like the one where Carl Rogers came to Caltech to discuss with us whether Caltech should develop a psychology department - I would draw the other people.
data.author: Richard P. Feynman

data.quote: Swift speedy time, feathered with flying hours, Dissolves the beauty of the fairest brow.
data.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

data.quote: You don't go around grieving all the time, but the grief is still there and always will be.
data.author: Nigella Lawson

data.quote: One of the most pervasive political visions of our time is the vision of liberals as compassionate and conservatives as less caring.
data.author: Thomas Sowell

data.quote: I play myself all the time, on camera and off. What else can I do?
data.author: Harry Dean Stanton

data.quote: My understanding of the creative process is simply that all cultures and all concerns meet at a certain point, the human point in which everything is related to one another. That has been my creative experience. I never know who's influencing me at any time.
data.author: Wole Soyinka

data.quote: After we were hit on September 11, 2001, we were in a state of national shock. Less than six weeks later, on October 26 2001, the U.S.A. Patriot Act was passed by a Congress that had little chance to debate it; many said that they scarcely had time to read it.
data.author: Naomi Wolf

data.quote: Time has been transformed, and we have changed; it has advanced and set us in motion; it has unveiled its face, inspiring us with bewilderment and exhilaration.
data.author: Khalil Gibran

data.quote: We are time's subjects, and time bids be gone.
data.author: William Shakespeare
